content.rendered:
Mini Tennis 3D : Play for Free

Mini Tennis 3D is a mixture with tennis ball and paddle game that give you the most authentic free sports games experience, Challenge your tennis buddies and become the next tennis open champion.

An online game, where you will play tennis with little characters.

Mini Tennis 3D is a great online game for tennis fans

Mini Tennis 3D game is a fun addictive hyper casual sports game where you can play many tennis tournaments of between it: grand slam, world tennis open,… have fun and collect all trophies and earn coins to unlock a wide range of characters.

If you don’t want to deal with any settings, you can simply start playing right away. Your objective will be to win every match. You will then start ascending the leader boards and earning more diamonds.
These can be spent in the menu and you can buy a new character with these. There is 27 characters in total, so you will be able to choose whichever you want. You can also earn the diamonds in bonus levels where a mini-game awaits. During the fight, you can find many different bonuses that you can pick up. You can expect pretty graphics and simple gameplay, so enjoy the game!

Cool Mini Tennis 3D game

Win the whole tournament to become the champion of this cool Mini Tennis 3D game. How many times can you defeat your opponent and leave the match as the winner? Find out now and have fun with Mini Tennis 3D!
